name: Black Release 2016 Robusto (Cigar King Exclusive)
additionalNotes:
From whoever answers PMs at the HVC Facebook page: "That was an exclusive project for them (Cigar King) with Corojo 99 wrapper and 100 % Aganorsa Tobacco."

This was not a "Black Friday" release.  These come with a plain black band with no text or graphics.

Mentioned here: https://www.cigarking.com/hvc-black-friday-2020/
